title: Fukuroi, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar center L edge; URQ
description: two people poke at a fire below a kettle suspended from a tree at LL; man at LL rests, smoking, inside a thatched hut; smoke from the fire rises in front of the tree and rooftop; another traveler adjusts his sandals behind a tall woven pack still mounted on his back; grassy plain in middle ground with figure leading a horse in the distance; bales and village rooftops at R
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
